file_insights.changes: Extensive documentation added for Astro Storefront Integration with Medusa 2.0

patterns_discovered: Microservice architecture with clear separation between frontend and backend
Static Site Generation (SSG) with Incremental Static Regeneration (ISR) for product pages
Detailed data flow documentation with architecture diagrams
gotchas_discovered: Requires careful management of localStorage for cart state
Complex multi-step checkout flow with multiple API interactions
Need for secure handling of cart and customer data

approach_outcome.primary_goal: Connect Astro storefront to Medusa API

recommendations: Implement proper error handling in API interactions
Use Medusa JS SDK for consistent API interactions
Design responsive and interactive components for cart and checkout
